verses.verse: Therefore you shall <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4931>charge<s%>, and his <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and his <S%H4687>commandments<s%>, <S%H3117>always<s%>.

And <S%H3045>know<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>: for I speak not with your <S%H1121>sons<s%> which have not <S%H3045>known<s%>, and which have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> the <S%H4148>chastisement<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, his <S%H1433>greatness<s%>, his <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and his stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>,

And his <S%H226>miracles<s%>, and his <S%H4639>acts<s%>, which he <S%H6213>did<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and unto all his <S%H776>land<s%>;

And what he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto the <S%H2428>army<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, unto their <S%H5483>horses<s%>, and to their <S%H7393>chariots<s%>; how he made the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H5488>Red<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H6687>overflow<s%> <S%H6440>them<s%> as they <S%H7291>pursued<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>, and how the Lord has <S%H6>destroyed<s%> them unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>;
And what he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto you in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, until you <S%H935>came<s%> into this <S%H4725>place<s%>;

And what he <S%H6213>did<s%> unto <S%H1885>Dathan<s%> and <S%H48>Abiram<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H446>Eliab<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%>: how the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H6475>opened<s%> her <S%H6310>mouth<s%>, and swallowed them <S%H1104>up<s%>, and their <S%H1004>households<s%>, and their <S%H168>tents<s%>, and all the <S%H3351>substance<s%> that was in their <S%H7272>possession<s%>, in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:
But your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> all the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4639>acts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> which he <S%H6213>did<s%>.

Therefore shall you <S%H8104>keep<s%> all the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that you may be <S%H2388>strong<s%>, and go <S%H935>in<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>, where you <S%H5674>go<s%> to possess <S%H3423>it<s%>;

And that you may <S%H748>prolong<s%> your <S%H3117>days<s%> in the <S%H127>land<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> unto them and to their <S%H2233>seed<s%>, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>.

For the <S%H776>land<s%>, where you go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H776>it<s%>, is not as the land of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, from from where you came <S%H3318>out<s%>, where you <S%H2232>sowed<s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%>, and <S%H8248>watered<s%> it with your <S%H7272>foot<s%>, as a <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H3419>herbs<s%>:

But the <S%H776>land<s%>, where you <S%H5674>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H776>it<s%>, is a land of <S%H2022>hills<s%> and <S%H1237>valleys<s%>, and <S%H8354>drinks<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>:

A <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> cares <S%H1875>for<s%>: the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> are <S%H8548>always<s%> upon <S%H7225>it<s%>, from the beginning of the <S%H8141>year<s%> even unto the <S%H319>end<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, if you shall listen <S%H8085>diligently<s%> unto my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and to <S%H5647>serve<s%> him with all your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and with all your <S%H5315>soul<s%>,

That I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H4306>rain<s%> of your <S%H776>land<s%> in his due <S%H6256>season<s%>, the first <S%H3138>rain<s%> and the latter <S%H4456>rain<s%>, that you may <S%H622>gather<s%> in your <S%H1715>corn<s%>, and your <S%H8492>wine<s%>, and your <S%H3323>oil<s%>.
And I will <S%H5414>send<s%> <S%H6212>grass<s%> in your <S%H7704>fields<s%> for your <S%H929>cattle<s%>, that you may <S%H398>eat<s%> and be <S%H7646>full<s%>.

Take <S%H8104>care<s%> to <S%H3824>yourselves<s%>, that your heart be not <S%H6601>deceived<s%>, and you turn <S%H5493>aside<s%>, and <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and worship <S%H7812>them<s%>;

And then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H639>wrath<s%> be <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against <S%H6113>you<s%>, and he shut up the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, that there be no <S%H4306>rain<s%>, and that the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H5414>yield<s%> not her <S%H2981>fruit<s%>; and lest you <S%H6>perish<s%> <S%H4120>quickly<s%> from off the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> gives <S%H5414>you<s%>.

Therefore shall you lay <S%H7760>up<s%> these my <S%H1697>words<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart<s%> and in your <S%H5315>soul<s%>, and <S%H7194>bind<s%> them for a <S%H226>sign<s%> upon your <S%H3027>hand<s%>, that they may be as <S%H2903>frontlets<s%> between your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And you shall <S%H3925>teach<s%> them your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H1696>speaking<s%> of them when you <S%H3427>sit<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%>, and when you <S%H3212>walk<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>, when you <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H6965>down<s%>, and when you rise up.
And you shall <S%H3789>write<s%> them upon the door <S%H4201>posts<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%>, and upon your <S%H8179>gates<s%>:

That your <S%H3117>days<s%> may be <S%H7235>multiplied<s%>, and the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%>, in the <S%H127>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3117>them<s%>, as the days of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

For if you shall <S%H8104>diligently<s%> <S%H8104>keep<s%> all these <S%H4687>commandments<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>, to do <S%H157>them<s%>, to love the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3212>walk<s%> in all his <S%H1870>ways<s%>, and to cleave unto <S%H1692>him<s%>;

Then will the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> all these <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3423>you<s%>, and you shall possess <S%H1419>greater<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and mightier than <S%H6099>yourselves<s%>.

Every <S%H4725>place<s%> whereon the <S%H3709>soles<s%> of your <S%H7272>feet<s%> shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> shall be <S%H4057>yours<s%>: from the wilderness and <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%>, from the <S%H5104>river<s%>, the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H6578>Euphrates<s%>, even unto the <S%H314>outermost<s%> <S%H3220>sea<s%> shall your coast <S%H1366>be<s%>.

There shall no <S%H376>man<s%> be able to <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>you<s%>: for the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H5414>lay<s%> the <S%H6343>fear<s%> of you and the <S%H4172>dread<s%> of you <S%H6440>upon<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> that you shall <S%H1869>tread<s%> <S%H1696>upon<s%>, as he has said unto you.
<S%H7200>Behold<s%>, I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%> a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse<s%>;
A <S%H1293>blessing<s%>, if you <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>:

And a <S%H7045>curse<s%>, if you will not <S%H8085>obey<s%> the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, but turn <S%H5493>aside<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H6680>command<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, which you have not <S%H3045>known<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H3068>pass<s%>, when the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> has brought you <S%H935>in<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> where you <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H5414>it<s%>, that you shall put the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> upon <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H1630>Gerizim<s%>, and the <S%H7045>curse<s%> upon <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H5858>Ebal<s%>.

Are they not on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, <S%H310>by<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> where the <S%H8121>sun<s%> goes <S%H3996>down<s%>, in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%>, which <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H6160>Arabah<s%> over <S%H4136>against<s%> <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>, <S%H681>beside<s%> the <S%H436>plains<s%> of <S%H4176>Moreh<s%>?

For you shall pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H3423>you<s%>, and you shall possess <S%H3427>it<s%>, and live in it.
And you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and <S%H4941>judgments<s%> which I <S%H5414>set<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
